Title: blockSize
Description:
In ClickHouse, queries are processed in blocks (chunks).
This function returns the size (row count) of the block the function is called on.
Examples: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS test;CREATE TABLE test (n UInt8) ENGINE = Memory;INSERT INTO testSELECT * FROM system.numbers LIMIT 5;SELECT blockSize()FROM test;
EffectiveSQLsRefined: CREATE TABLE test (n UInt8) ENGINE = Memory;
